Description.Text:
Property Location
Located in Leipzig (Wiederitzsch), ACHAT Comfort Messe-Leipzig is convenient to Sachsen Park and Leipzig Trade Fair. This hotel is within the vicinity of GolfPark Leipzig and BMW Factory.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 99 guestrooms, featuring kitchenettes. LCD televisions with cable programming provide entertainment, while wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare (surcharge). Additional amenities include gift shops/newsstands, shopping on site, and a television in the lobby.

Dining
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant or in a coffee shop/café. Or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, a computer station, and express check-in. Event facilities at this hotel consist of meeting rooms and a meeting room. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge during limited hours, and free self parking is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a meal at a restaurant or in a coffee shop/café. Or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Make use of convenient amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting/childcare (surcharge). Additional amenities include gift shops/newsstands, shopping on site, and a television in the lobby.

Located in Leipzig (Wiederitzsch), ACHAT Comfort Messe-Leipzig is convenient to Sachsen Park and Leipzig Trade Fair. This hotel is within the vicinity of GolfPark Leipzig and BMW Factory.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Sachsen Park - 2 km / 1.3 mi
Leipzig Trade Fair - 2.5 km / 1.6 mi
GolfPark Leipzig - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
BMW Factory - 5 km / 3.1 mi
Porsche Factory - 5.1 km / 3.1 mi
Abtnaundorfer Park - 5.2 km / 3.2 mi
Leipzig Zoo - 6.3 km / 3.9 mi
Leipziger Auwald - 6.4 km / 4 mi
Red Bull Arena - 6.6 km / 4.1 mi
Museum of Fine Arts - 6.9 km / 4.3 mi
Runde Ecke Memorial Museum - 7 km / 4.3 mi
Leipzig City History Museum - Neubau - 7 km / 4.3 mi
Arena Leipzig - 7 km / 4.4 mi
Museum Zum Arabischen Coffe Baum - 7 km / 4.4 mi
Barfussgasse - 7.1 km / 4.4 mi

The preferred airport for ACHAT Comfort Messe-Leipzig is Leipzig (LEJ-Leipzig - Halle) - 9.9 km / 6.1 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for ACHAT Comfort Hotel Messe Leipzig is Leipzig (LEJ-Leipzig - Halle) - 9.9 km / 6.1 mi.
